theVirtuoso:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theVirtuoso:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theVirtuoso:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theVirtuoso:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theVirtuoso:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theVirtuoso:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theVirtuoso:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theVirtuoso:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theVirtuoso:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theVirtuoso:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theVirtuoso:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theVirtuoso:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theVirtuoso:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theVirtuoso:Flare.NAME: Flare
theVirtuoso:Flare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and then apply !M! Vulnerable.

theVirtuoso:MetalGearSolid.NAME: Metal Gear Solid
theVirtuoso:MetalGearSolid.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP and gain !theVirtuoso:SecondMagic! plated armor.
